title: A "Killer Clown" Is Stalking The Scotland Streets, And Here's His Video Warning To The Villagers
description:
A creepy clown in a Pennywise costume has been stalking the streets of a Scottish Village, leaving red balloons everywhere, just weeks before Halloween. This has left some individuals so fearful that they cannot even leave their houses.


— (@)

The clown issued a message to the media and dared the police to catch him. <

title: Watch: Dylan Mulvaney Wins “WOMAN” of the year award, because of course he/she/they do
description:
The patriarchy strikes once again.

A gay magazine in the UK has awarded their first ever “Women of the Year” award to a man.

Dylan Mulvaney has been honored by the magazine “Attitude” after only being a woman for not even several years.

— (@)

“Some see me as woman of the year — some see me as a woman of a year and some change,” he said alluding to the fact that he “only publicly come out online 560 days ago.”

“And some people don’t see me as a woman at all,” he said.

Gee, I wonder

title: Watch: 'Stop Petro Pete' Screams Climate Protesters As They Chase Buttigieg From Event
description:
Radical left-wing climate activists stormed the stage at an event in Baltimore and demanded Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg stop fossil fuel infrastructure projects.

I had no clue Buttigieg was back from maternity leave.

In a video that is very satisfying to watch, over a dozen activists from the left-wing youth-led organization, Climate Defiance, stormed the stage while Buttigieg was speaking and ran him out of the event. The climate alarmists demanded that he put an end to two proposed oil transport projects that the Department of Transportation's Maritime Administration is reviewing.

title: Woman Deemed ‘Moderate Risk’ After Beating Man With Metal Pole Released Without Bail, Kills Mom Of 8
description:

They keep trying to gaslight us and tell us not to worry. Only people who jaywalk will be let out.

Well, anyone with half a brain knows that is complete crap.

title: Watch: When the looting started at this California jewelry store, the shooting started and they scurried like rats
description:
Security camera footage shows yet another smash-and-grab in yet another store in California, where crime is legal-ish in the name of "equity." But this video has a twist. The store owner had a gun and fired off a few rounds as the people stealing just to keep milk and bread on the table ran away.

Prayers up for the store owner. California wants to make it illegal for him to do anything to prevent shoplifting. Too many store owners are being forced to take matters into their own hands because of the California government. So the California government is trying to criminalize them doing so.

title: NFL teams get blasted over pro-Israel social media posts. Nothing to do with Israel. Fans are angry their teams suck.
description:
There are more important things going on in the world than football, sure. Chalk this up to gallows humor. Because when most brands get blasted for posting something pro-Israel, it's usually from pro-terrorism stans like congresswoman Rashida Tlaib and social media influencer Rep. AOC.
